overview: Gameweek 28 features several favorable matchups for FPL managers, with Liverpool vs Southampton (H) and Crystal Palace vs Ipswich (H) standing out as prime targets for big hauls. Managers should prioritize assets from these matches while considering rotation risks due to European commitments. With 5 free transfers and multiple chips available, this is an ideal week to optimize squad structure for both GW28 and future blank/double gameweeks.

teamInsights.currentTeamAnalysis: Goalkeeping situation needs immediate attention with Sanchez benched. Defense lacks Palace coverage. Midfield strong but carries rotation risks (Sancho). Forwards lack double gameweek players.

Add Palace defensive coverage for favorable fixtures
